page.title: 09ARCHAEOLOGICAL DISCOVERY 2.
page.content: Some local people say that if you stood on the mound in the field before it was levelled you could see both ways up and down the river in front of you, and behind, you could see right up to the hills, so it is likely that this was the remains of possibly a 5th century {EARTH FORT}or even the site of a whole settlement. Whenever they were trying to investigate the {souterrain}the entrance (a large boulder) was removed by a large bulldozer, it was then that the whole complex caved in, making a large rumble.It was very sad to see part of our heritage, which had lasted 1500 years disappear in a split second with the use of modern machinery.
